Summary More than a decade interested in software, network and online security hobbyist who does it professionally, self motivated and attentive to details always interested in learning new technologies with strong analytical, troubleshooting and debugging skills. 
 
Experience with most operating systems such as but not limited to: Android, iOS, Linux, OSX,  
Windows. 
 
Intense experience in code analysis and reverse engineering of executable files for various architectures and operating systems such as but not limited to: ARM, MIPS, PPC, x86, x64.  
 
Excellent understanding of Windows operating system and it internals. Rootkit, driver, crash dump analysis and debugging for Windows.  
 
Exploits analysis experience in Adobe PDF and Flash, Microsoft Windows kernel and user mode, malware and vulnerability analysis, byte code and virtual machine analysis ( JVM, MSIL, etc. ), perfect understanding of Microsoft PE/COFF file format as well as experience in ELF and Mach-O file formats 
 
Experience in most common encryption algorithms such as but not limited to: AES/Rijndael, DSA, ECC/ElGamal, RSA, TEA. 
 
Unpacking experience with most common commercial copy protections such as but not limited to: Armadillo, AsProtect, Star-Force, Themida, VmProtect 
 
Development of custom decompilers, disassemblers, deobfuscators, emulators, parsers and unpackers/packers for code and file analysis. 
 
Experience in various image file formats encoding such as but not limited to BMP, JPG, TIFF, GIF, DDS, TGA, PNG. 
 
Familiarity with DRM schemes used by Apple, EA, Google, Sony and Valve. 
 
Parallel programming in OpenCL, compiler optimizations and graph analysis experience, penetration, black and white box testing experience, SDL or Security Development Lifecycle experience, Intel VT-x hyper-visor development experience. 
 
Specialties: Assembler, C, C++, C#, MSIL, MASM, Python, WinAPI, CryptoAPI, OpenSSL, OpenCL, Windows Internals, Reverse engineering, Ollydbg, IDA Pro, SoftIce, WinDbg, Wireshark.
